content: For example, there could be a six team playoff in which the winners of the power five conferences are all guaranteed a spot. The remaining spot would go to the highest ranked team that is either an independent or in one of the other conferences. Seeding would be based on ranking. Obviously, this doesn’t remove all subjectivity. There would still be an element of subjectivity in seeding and picking the sixth team. But, it certainly minimizes it and that’s the goal. The less subjectivity, the better.
